author: Mike Stumbo
description: A comprehensive asset management system for Maya 2025.3 with advanced Search & Discovery features, smart auto-completion, recent assets tracking, favorites system, and multi-criteria search filters

MAINTAINED: All v1.2.0 revolutionary background color technology and multi-select functionality
